association not subject to state bid requirementsSection 83-34-4 - Nonadmitted policy fee; responsibility of surplus lines insurance producer placing insurance through nonadmitted insurer to collect and remit fees; calculation of fee; penalty for nonpaymentSection 83-34-5 - Powers and dutiesSection 83-34-7 - Designation of temporary board of directors; expiration of terms of office; permanent board of directors; composition of board; selection and qualifications of board members; terms of office; powersSection 83-34-9 - Participation by assessable insurers in recoupable and nonrecoupable assessments levied by association; financial incentives and/or penalties to ensure assessable insurers write insurance in the coast areaSection 83-34-10 - Power to levy recoupable and nonrecoupable assessments upon occurrence of certain events; maximum nonrecoupable assessmentsSection 83-34-11 - [Repealed]Section 83-34-12 - Deferment of assessable insurer's recoupable or nonrecoupable assessment; amount deferred to be assessed against other assessable insurersSection 83-34-13 - Plan of operation; contents; approval by commissioner; certification of approval; effective date of planSection 83-34-15 - Application for coverage; inspection of property; issuance of insurance; appeal of denial of applicationSection 83-34-16 - Premium discount for building "fortified home."Section 83-34-17 - RatesSection 83-34-19 - AppealsSection 83-34-21 - Reports of inspection made availableSection 83-34-23 - Immunity from liabilitySection 83-34-25 - Annual reportSection 83-34-27 - Commissioner may examine affairs of association; commissioner and association may examine data and payments of assessable insurer or insurers placing insurance through nonadmitted insurersSection 83-34-29 - Rules and regulationsSection 83-34-31 - Powers and authority of board of directors to issue bonds and enter into loans or other forms of indebtedness; rights and remedies of bondholders not to be impairedSection 83-34-33 - Surcharge for excess covered event losses on all property and casualty premiums; issuance of bonds to pay claims losses; exempted premiums; purpose of certain surcharges to be designated and specifically identified; licensed insurers and agents to collect and remit surcharges; setting and adjustment of surcharge percentage; cessation of surchargeSection 83-34-35 - Commissioner to approve association rates at least adequate to fund annual reinsurance above a certain reserveSection 83-34-37 - Mississippi Windstorm Underwriting Association Reinsurance Assistance Fund created; purpose; use of funds; reportsSection 83-34-39 - [Repealed]
